title: (x) Please help identify this script font / 'A Touch of Ink': casual handwriting style - MoanHand {Nina}
content:
Can anyone identify this font please. Many thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [proof 1 circle leaflets.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203081026/http:/typophile.com/files/proof%201%20circle%20leaflets.pdf) | 507.05 KB |
author: Katherine Daniel

comments.content: Your help would be much appreciated

The PDF properties say it all:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203081026im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PDFid_4515.png)

In case you are wondering where to get it, [Moan Hand](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203081026/http:/www.dafont.com/moanhand.font) is a freebie from JoeBob Graphics.

- Mike Yanega
